articles.description: India has added 15.4 gigawatts renewable power capacity in 2021, third highest globally after China and the United States, the report said
articles.content: India added around 15.4 gigawatts (GW) of renewable power capacity in 2021, the third highest after China (136 GW) and the United States (43 GW), according to a global status report released on Wedne… [+4981 chars]

articles.title: Russia Cuts Gas Supplies To Europe For "Repairs"; Germany Slams Move - NDTV
articles.description: Russian energy giant Gazprom's decision to cut supplies of natural gas to Europe via the Nord Stream pipeline was "political", Germany's economy minister said Wednesday.
articles.content:
Russia-Ukraine War: Gazprom announced it would be cutting deliveries via the pipeline.
